content: Thanks a lot. withoutErrToSorry did the trick (I tried this first, but presumably Expr.hasSyntheticSorry will work too.

A related question: if a term is not elaborated with error unknown universe level 'u', is there some way to add the universe level u to the list of level variables. As far as I understood this was in some environment extension.
Figured this out. The usual pattern of withLevelNames does the trick.
Siddhartha Gadgil has marked this topic as resolved.
